name: Run Zeus Run
description: "Run Zeus Run" is an endless runner with modern mechanics of a platformer, dynamic music, incremental challenge needing patience, focus and bit of strategy. Try to get the highest score, the highest amount of coins, the highest monster kills and play until you are the best Zeus in the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD 5670 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Internet Connection to access leaderboards
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
